message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I believe you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested in the product, but $9,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you be willing to come down to $7,000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see that you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $8,500?
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference and settle on $8,000?
